notes: 10 root categories. Credentials removed (not skills). Max 4 levels deep.

categories.name: perception_and_observation
categories.description: Sensing, monitoring, detecting, inspecting, recognizing patterns, situational awareness

categories.name: language_and_communication
categories.description: Speaking, writing, translating, presenting, documentation, reading comprehension, active listening

categories.name: cognitive_and_analytical
categories.description: Logic, math, statistics, research, problem-solving, critical thinking, reasoning, judgment, decision-making

categories.name: creative_and_generative
categories.description: Design, art, music, creative writing, innovation, ideation, synthesis, imagination, brainstorming

categories.name: execution_and_compliance
categories.description: Following procedures, regulatory compliance, quality assurance, auditing, standards adherence, process execution

categories.name: technical
categories.description: Tools, platforms, programming languages, systems, software, hardware, digital skills, technology fluency

categories.name: physical_and_manual
categories.description: Motor skills, craftsmanship, athletics, equipment operation, dexterity, physical endurance, hand-eye coordination

categories.name: domain_expertise
categories.description: Industry-specific knowledge: healthcare, finance, legal, education, manufacturing, retail, government

categories.name: interpersonal
categories.description: Leadership, negotiation, mentoring, conflict resolution, teamwork, collaboration, empathy, influence

categories.name: self_management
categories.description: Time management, stress management, adaptability, self-motivation, emotional regulation, resilience, learning agility

categories.name: _NeedsReview
categories.description: Skills that don't fit cleanly into existing categories and require human review for proper classification
